about_the_game:
About This Game

You are a knight honorable, brave, and bound to the kingdom. But this is no ordinary day in the realm.

As dawn breaks over the medieval kingdom, you and your fellow knights prepare to uphold your duties: to patrol the forests, guard the castle gates, and protect the people. Each knight stands by your side, sworn to the same codes of loyalty and valor. Or so you thought…

But whispers have spread across the realm. Under you walks an infiltrator, hiding behind a knight’s armor and waiting for the right moment to strike. This imposter, clever and ruthless, has one goal—to dismantle the Order from within and carry out a dark mission. Trust begins to crumble as you look to your comrades with suspicion. The question haunts every conversation, every glance: Who is the undercover infiltrator hiding under us?

A Journey of Suspicion and Survival

Your quest will take you deep into the heart of this medieval world, across winding forest trails and bustling village streets. Each day brings a series of duties: you’ll defend villagers from outlaws, protect royal secrets, and, above all, stay vigilant for any sign of betrayal. As you carry out these noble tasks, every word spoken and action taken by those around you takes on a new, ominous weight.

But the infiltrator is cunning. They blend in, playing the role of a loyal knight, all while weaving distrust, watching your every move, and waiting to strike. Your choices could mean the difference between victory and defeat, honor and disgrace.

Do You Dare to Trust?

In Undercover, trust is the rarest currency. As you move through this medieval world, each decision, each word, and each glance could be your last. Gather your courage, ready your sword, and remember—true honor lies not just in victory, but in survival.

name: Undercover

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 1060, AMD RX56
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

short_description: In Undercover, you enter a medieval world as a noble knight among trusted comrades. But beware—one of you is an infiltrator with a deadly mission. While you carry out your knightly duties, deception and danger lurk in the shadows. Can you unmask the traitor before they strike?
